questions_1.question: Identify the two subsystems through which engine control is maintained.
Options: A hydro mechanical core engine speed governing system
An electrical fan speed governing system
A electrical core engine governing system
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "A hydro mechanical core engine speed governing system, An electrical fan speed governing system"

The valid answer is "A hydro mechanical core engine speed governing system, An electrical fan speed governing system"
